TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InsertKeyMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the insertion mode used by text boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Honors the current INSERT key mode of the keyboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode Insert = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the insertion mode is enabled regardless of the INSERT key mode of the keyboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode Overwrite = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the overwrite mode is enabled regardless of the INSERT key mode of the keyboard.
